1:
RESTRICTED 
NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/DIV.I (Weapon) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI- 01 
Dated: 17 /04//2009 
 
 
CIRCULAR NO. 09/ 2009 
 
Sub : Security arrangements for Shri Navin B. Chawla, Election 
Commissioner of India: 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 29/2002 dated 
24/9/2002, One Armed Personal Security Officer of Shri Navin B. 
Chawla, Election Commissioner of India, is permitted to carry his 
weapon and ammunition on his person or in his hand baggage, 
while accompanying the dignitary on board flight within the country 
till 31st May 2009. The weapon shall be carried in fully unloaded 
condition i.e weapon and ammunition shall be kept separately  
 
M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
